summary: A newer version of my glass sword mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=13][color=blue]Glass Sword of Sapphires[/color][/size]
============================================================[/center]

[b]Description[/b]
This is a newer version of my original glass retex that went
under the same name... I uploaded an entierly
new file just so more poeple could notice this one instead
of the \"old\" one. Ive gotten several requests for an entire set. 
But im not sure if I have time..

[b]Permissions[/b]
You may use this how ever you like, just give me credit :)

[b]Requests[/b] 
If you have any \"minor\" requests please post them in the comments
or PM me...

[b]Non-Replacer[/b]
I want to add this to the game as a non replacer (scince i probably
wont make a set to acompany it) but i need someone to do this
for me, as i am just a texturer.

[b]Finaly[/b]
Constructive critisism is much apreciated. And if you
like the texture, please click that endorse button. It\'s probably
up there somewhere :P

-KevSer
author: Kevin
